data.quote: Memory is useful to address the world. Consciousness is useful to address yourself
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: For every solution there is a problem, not the other way round
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Being human means we can transcend natural laws and make something larger than ourselves
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Success is relative but perfection is not
data.author: Vivek Sharma

data.quote: All the creatures are pleased by loving words; and therefore we should address words that are pleasing to all, for there is no lack of sweet words
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: It doesn't matted how many times you screw it up , fame come upone that one time you suceed
data.author: Vivek Sharma

data.quote: The only one who can see the whole picture is the one standing out of it
data.author: Vivek Sharma

data.quote: There is pleasure when a sore is scratched, But to be without sores is more pleasurable still. Just so, there are pleasures in worldly desires, But to be without desires is more pleasurable still
data.author: Nagarjuna

data.quote: A good bark year makes a good wheat year.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: A friend advises in his interest, not yours.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: A foolish ruler, a weak child, and a person mad after riches, desire that which can not be procured.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: All propaganda has to be popular and has to accommodate itself to the comprehension of the least intelligent of those whom it seeks to reach.
data.author: Adolf Hitler

data.quote: The victor will never be asked if he told the truth.
data.author: Adolf Hitler

data.quote: The great masses of the people will more easily fall victims to a big lie than to a small one.
data.author: Adolf Hitler

data.quote: Demoralize the enemy from within by surprise, terror, sabotage, assassination. This is the war of the future.
data.author: Adolf Hitler

data.quote: Those who want to live, let them fight, and those who do not want to fight in this world of eternal struggle do not deserve to live.
data.author: Adolf Hitler

data.quote: He alone, who owns the youth, gains the future.
data.author: Adolf Hitler

data.quote: Make the lie big, make it simple, keep saying it, and eventually they will believe it.
data.author: Adolf Hitler

data.quote: If you tell a big enough lie and tell it frequently enough, it will be believed.
data.author: Adolf Hitler

data.quote: All things arise,Suffer change,And pass away.This is their nature.When you know this,Nothing perturbs you,Nothing hurts you.You become still.
data.author: Ashṭāvakra
